alert.note: Alert for Delta; Fannin; Hopkins; Hunt; Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 10:04PM CDT until June 11 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Hunt County in north central Texas... Northern Hopkins County in north central Texas... Delta County in north central Texas... Southern Lamar County in north central Texas... Southern Fannin County in north central Texas... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1004 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Pattonville to 6 miles southeast of Honey Grove to near Randolph, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Commerce, Leonard, Cooper, Honey Grove, Wolfe City, Celeste, Roxton, Trenton, Merit, Cooper Lake, Randolph, Bonham State Park, Big Creek Lake, Cooper Lake State Park, Pattonville, Klondike, Ladonia, Deport, Tira and Bailey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
